Athame.Name: Crimson Pact
Athame.Effect: Whenever the user damages an enemy, they sacrifice HP equal to 10% of the total damage the foe took, if able. Then, they gain permanent bonus damage equal to the damage they took. (Bonus damage is also gained through effect-derived CP.)

Athame.Name: Bloodrush
Athame.Effect: If this move is used in Melee range, before accuracy, the user gains +3 DMG and +1 MP for one round.

Athame.Name: Infusion
Athame.Effect: The user gains Shield for one round equal to the amount of damage they take from Crimson Pact from using this attack.

Athame.Name: Purloin Youth
Athame.Effect: The target suffers -1 Evasions, and the user gains +1 Evasions, for 1 round.  If the target misses their next Standard/Full attack on the user, the user rolls the attack's damage and takes 10% of the roll in Crimson Pact.

Athame.Name: Defile
Athame.Effect: Targets are inflicted with 5 Poison/1. For each target hit the user loses 1 HP to Crimson Pact.

Athame.Name: Black Magic
Athame.Effect: When the user has 8+ CP, they gain +1 MP permanently.  With 12+ CP,  they gain +3 DR permanently.  With 15+ CP, they gain +5 MAG permanently.

Athame.Name: Massacre
Athame.Effect: If an opponent is killed using this move, the CP gained from it is doubled. (Round down the amount gained normally before doubling.)

Athame.Name: Sanctified Blade
Athame.Effect: Crimson Pact's sacrifice amount on the user's next single-target attack is increased by 10%. If the Foe has targeted the user since the beginning of their last turn, the amount is increased by an additional 5%.

Athame.Name: Exsanguinate
Athame.Effect: This move does not benefit from the user's CP damage bonus. The user's current Black Magic buffs are doubled.

Athame.Name: Siphon Soul
Athame.Effect: Bonus damage to this move from Crimson Pact also restores the user's HP.

Athame.Name: Oblation
Athame.Effect: This move gets double bonus damage from Crimson Pact. For one round, the user's moves do not benefit from CP bonus.

Chalice.Name: Pact of the Elder
Chalice.Effect:
While active, the user's Blood tile creates a Blood Storm effect in Burst 1 of the tile. Foes must use an additional MP to exit the Blood Storm. 

If the user is within Range 3 of their Blood tile, they may choose to have their abilities originate from the Blood tile. By doing so, the attack gains +3 damage and attacks classified as Range/Homing/Line have -1 range.

Chalice.Name: Blood Storm
Chalice.Effect: The user sacrifices 10 HP to place a Blood tile in Range. The user may not have more than 1 Blood tile at once, and the Blood tile may be removed after 1 round as a Free action. The user's Blood tile cannot be overwritten.

Chalice.Name: Tainted Faith
Chalice.Effect: This ability inflicts unremovable 5 Poison/1. If this originated from the user's Blood tile, this instead becomes unremovable 7 Poison/1.

Chalice.Name: Defiled Tentacles
Chalice.Effect: This ability has Pull 2. If this ability originates from the user's Blood tile, it becomes 1/Foe/Range 6 and has Pull 4 instead.

Chalice.Name: Accursed Brew
Chalice.Effect: This ability gains +1 dice for every Poisoned target in range. If this ability originates from the user's Blood tile, it deals damage to all foes in the user's Blood Storm instead.

Chalice.Name: Crimson Rain
Chalice.Effect: The next time the user uses Blood Storm or Bloodlet, subtract the damage dealt by this attack from the HP sacrificed (this effect does not stack with itself). This ability is immune to outside factors to damage. Do not add MAG.

Chalice.Name: Toxic Blood
Chalice.Effect: For 1 round, Foes who enter the user's Blood Storm are inflicted with unremovable 3 Poison/1. If already inflicted with unremovable Poison, increase its damage by 3 and its duration by 1.

Chalice.Name: Hemokinesis
Chalice.Effect: The user's Blood tile is moved to the tile the target is currently on. This ability may be used as a non-damaging standard to move the Blood tile to a tile in range. The user then loses 5 HP.

Chalice.Name: Bloodlet
Chalice.Effect: The user sacrifices 7 HP to permanently increase the Burst of their Blood Storm by 1. Until the start of the user's next turn, the user and allies in the user's Blood Storm gain +3 DMG and +1 ACC. A Blood Storm may not increase in size more than once.

Chalice.Name: Blood Ties
Chalice.Effect: This ability must originate from the user's Blood tile. For 1 round, targets in the user's Blood Storm cannot exit the Blood Storm willingly.

Chalice.Name: Price of Power
Chalice.Effect: Before accuracy, the user and allies within the Blood Storm may each sacrifice 5 HP to give this ability +1 dice for every 5 HP sacrificed (max of +3 dice).

Chalice.Name: Eldritch Horror
Chalice.Effect: This ability must originate from the user's Blood tile and deals damage to all Foes in the Blood Storm. Poisoned targets take an additional 1d10+4 damage, and have their Poison extended by 1 round. Non-poisoned targets are inflicted with unremovable 3X Poison/1, -2X DR/1 and -2X DMG/1, where X is the amount of targets in the Blood Storm.

Scythe.Name: Reaper's Touch
Scythe.Effect: Whenever the user damages a foe, the user heals 1/8 of the damage dealt.

Scythe.Name: Reap
Scythe.Effect: The user heals an additional 8% of damage dealt.

Scythe.Name: Haunted Swing
Scythe.Effect: Targets at full HP take an additional 5 damage. The user heals 5 HP for each target this triggers on.

Scythe.Name: Pestilent Strike
Scythe.Effect: If the user heals 4+ HP from this move, it inflicts -3 Evasions/1.

Scythe.Name: Coup de Gr√¢ce
Scythe.Effect: If this kills a target, the user heals 10 HP and gains +5 damage to their next attack.

Scythe.Name: Wither Soul
Scythe.Effect: For each target that is currently under a debuff, this deals an additional 3 damage and the user heals 3 HP.

Scythe.Name: Hades's Toll
Scythe.Effect: For two rounds, the user's Reaper's Touch heal is doubled for attacks against the target.

Scythe.Name: Phantasmal Shield
Scythe.Effect: For one round, the user heals 10% of the damage taken from all attacks.

Scythe.Name: Memento Mori
Scythe.Effect: This attack's damage is delayed for one turn. The user may choose to delay it for up to 2 additional turns. For each additional turn delayed, the user heals an additional 1/8 of the damage from Reaper's Touch.

Scythe.Name: Spirit Break
Scythe.Effect: The target is inflicted with -3 DR/1, and the user gains +3 DMG/1.

Scythe.Name: Phantom Blade
Scythe.Effect: This move gains +damage equal to amount of HP the user has healed from Scythe abilities since the start of their last turn.
